name: Batman Arkham - Gameplay Remake
description:
This prototype is inspired by some mechanics of the games Batman Arkham from Rocksteady Studios!

Controls (also available in game) :

  • WASD / ZQSD / Left Stick : Movement
  • Mouse / Right stick : Camera movement
  • Spacebar / A : Sprint/Stop sprinting
  • Spacebar / LB (hold) : Glide
  • Left CTRL / RT (hold) : Dive (while gliding)
  • F / RB : Grappling Hook
  • Spacebar/ LB : Grapple boost (while grappling)
  • Left click / X : Attack
  • Right click / Y : Counter attack
